{{- if ne .Page.Section "registry" -}} {{- $url := urls.Parse .Destination -}} {{- $remoteSchemes := slice "http" "https" "mailto" -}} {{- $isRemote := in $remoteSchemes $url.Scheme -}} {{- $isFile := strings.HasSuffix .Destination "pdf" }} {{- if or $isRemote $isFile -}} {{ .Text | safeHTML }} {{- else if ( in .Destination ".html") -}} {{ .Text | safeHTML }} {{- else -}} {{ .Text | safeHTML }} {{- end -}} {{- end -}}
